title.rendered: Our Top LG Mobile Phone Deals

content.rendered:
Here at Fonehouse we pride ourselves on bringing you the very best handsets and the very best deals.  If you’re on the hunt for a new pay monthly contract or an upgrade deal then you’ll be happy to discover that we have a fantastic range of LG smartphones with some incredible deals on offer.

We appreciate that it can be an arduous task hunting through contracts to find the best mobile phone deal, which is why we have compiled a list of our very favourite. Whether you’re looking to save money, take advantage of a great data offering or enjoy added perks, read on to discover the best LG offer for you:

LG K4

The LG K4 is not only a visually beautiful smartphone, with a 5” display and a sleek design that feels great in hold, but it also packs a lot of punch; the K4 is powered by a 1.1GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 210 MSM8909 processor with 1GB of RAM, which means that all of your favourite apps will be running smoothly on Android 6.0.

Cheapest

£15 per month with no upfront cost, across 24 months on Vodafone Red Extra. With this plan you get unlimited texts, 500 minutes and 500MB as well, astonishingly, £80 cashback!

Best For Data

£47 per month for 60GB of data on a Vodafone Red Entertainment plan. This also gets you unlimited texts and minutes, £300 cashback plus a subscription to Spotify, Sky Sports or NowTV.

Best For Extras

£38 per month across 24 months with no upfront cost on an EE Essential plan. This give unlimited texts and minutes, 20GB of data and an impressive £300 cashback!

LG K8

The LG K8 combines a 5 inch touchscreen display with a 720 x 1080 pixel resolution for a great viewing experience. 1.25GHz quad-core processor come with 2GB of RAM and 16GB of internal storage that can then be expanded to up to 200GB via a micro SD card, meaning you don’t have to sacrifice any of your favourite apps from the Google Play Store.

The LG K8 also packs a brilliant 13MP rear camera and 5MP front shooter, so you can be sure that both your photographs and selfies are all clear, sharp and top quality.

Cheapest

£15 per month with nothing to pay upfront and unlimited texts and minutes. Over 24 months you’ll also get 500MB of data. This is an EE Essential plan and also offers £70 cashback!

Best For Data

£42 per month for 60GB of data on a Vodafone Red Entertainment plan. With this plan you have access to unlimited texts and minutes, £230 cashback and the fantastic perk of a subscription to Spotify, Sky Sports or NowTV; the choice is yours.

Best For Extras

£71 per month across 24 months with unlimited minutes and texts, plus £60 GB of data. As this is a Vodafone Red Entertainment plan, users also get to choose a subscription to Spotify, NowTV or Sky Sports plus a fantastic £300 cashback offer.

LG K10

The LG K10 features combines beautiful design and an impressive internal spec to make for a smartphone that won’t fail to impress. The curved design features classically rounded edges and is reinforced by 2.5D Arc glass for extra durability.

A 5.3inch HD display, a 13MP rear camera, a 1.5 GHz MediaTek octa-core processor and bags of storage (2GB of internal RAM and 16GB of storage) all means that this is a handset that punches way above its weight.

Cheapest

£15 per month with no upfront cost across 24 months, giving users unlimited texts and minutes, 500MB of data and £50 cashback on an EE Essential plan.

Best For Data

£59 per month across 24 months with absolutely no upfront cost. Users will get unlimited texts and minutes and a whopping 60GB of data. You can also get a free subscription to Spotify, NowTV or Sky Sports as part of your plan and take advantage of our brilliant £300 cashback offer, all on Vodafone Red Entertainment.

Best For Extras

£57 per month across 24 months with absolutely nothing to pay upfront. This fantastic plan gives unlimited texts and minutes, 32GB and £300 cashback. As an extra bonus you can also choose a subscription to either Spotify, NowTV or Sky Sports thanks to Vodafone Red Entertainment.

LG Q6

The LG Q6 has to be one of the most durable phones that we have at Fonehouse. It comes fully equipped with a lightweight ‘H Beam’ frame made from incredibly strong 7000 series aluminium, resulting in a phone that will easily withstand daily life and could survive even the clumsiest of owners. This is furthered by 5.5 inch screen which is reinforced with Gorilla glass, and when you add to that a huge 13MP camera and potential for up to 256GB of storage, as well as a 3000mAh battery, this is a phone that’s as powerful as it is durable.

Cheapest

£18 per month over 24 months with no upfront cost on an EE Essential plan. This plan gives unlimited minutes and texts 1GB of data and £20 cashback.

Best For Data

£47 per month, with nothing to pay upfront and a huge 60GB of data. You’ll also get unlimited minutes and texts, £260 cashback and, as this is a Vodafone Red Entertainment plan, a fantastic entertainment subscription.

Best For Extras

For £47 per month, over 24 months and with nothing to pay upfront, this plan will get you unlimited texts and minutes, 16GB of data and an amazing £300 cashback on Vodafone Red Extra.

LG G6

The fantastic LG G6 is available in four great colours, so you’re guaranteed to find a handset that suits your style. It also features a large 18:9 display with QHD Plus Resolution for an incredible viewing experience. With added Gorilla glass exterior the user is guaranteed extra durability and resistance, making for a phone that not only looks great, but is reliable and practical.

On top of all of that the G6 also features an impressive 13MP rear camera with 4K video capacity, an ultra responsive fingerprint and a powerful 3000mAh battery.

Cheapest

£26 per month for unlimited texts and minutes, 500MB of data and £10 cashback. This is over 24 months on an EE Essential plan.

Best For Data

£47 per month, with nothing to pay upfront and an incredible 60GB of data. You’ll also get unlimited minutes and texts, £150 cashback and, on a Vodafone Red Entertainment plan, you also get a fantastic entertainment subscription included in your plan.

Best For Extras

With nothing to pay up front, when you pay £48 per month across 24 months, you can get unlimited texts and minutes and 25GB of data plus an incredible £300 per month on an EE Essential plan.

Now that you know our favourite deals, all that\’s left to do is decide which LG handset is the right one for you! 

To help you make your decision we have some fantastic reviews from both the experts at Fonehouse and our happy customers on out blog, but if you need more information don’t hesitate to give our friendly customer service team a call to talk through your needs.
